box1.heading: Salom, men Nuriddinbek Obidjonov
box1.text: 1,5 yildan ortiq tajribaga ega bo'lgan, mijozlarga katta e'tibor qaratgan, mukammal aloqa qobiliyatlari va texnik platforma malakasiga ega dasturiy ta'minot bo'yicha mutaxassis

box3.heading: Vaqt Zonasi
box3.text: Men Toshkentda yashayman va butun dunyo bo'ylab masofaviy ishlashga ochiqman

box5.heading: Texnik Qobiliyat
box5.text: Men kuchli va kengaytiriladigan ilovalarni yaratuvchi turli dasturlash tillari, kutubxonalarga ixtisoslashganman

p1.heading: Ijaraga Avtomobil Platformasi
p1.info: Dubayda avtoulovlarni ijaraga olish uchun qulay sayt, mijozlarga avtomobillarning narxi va barcha qulayliklari haqida oldindan bilishga imkon beradi va shundan keyin qaysi mashinani ijaraga olish kerakligini hal qiladi

text.1: Rest-full API bilan sezgir veb-sayt yaratish
text.2: Xavfsiz autentifikatsiya qilish va egasi tomonidan ma'lumotlarni o'zgartirish uchun Administrator panelini joriy qilish
text.3: Tailwind CSS bilan sezgir frontendni ishlab chiqdi, bu foydalanuvchi tajribasini yaxshilaydi
text.4: Avtomobillarni turlari, narxi, markasi va boshqalar bo'yicha saralash uchun filtrlar qo'shildi...

p2.heading: Uy-joy Savdosi
p2.info: Sale website for newly made homes, the owner is Atabaey Bahadir that's why website name was also matched to his name

text.1: Created with Vite to make it modern and fast
text.2: Used i18next to make this platform multilingual and added three languages - english, russian, uzbek
text.3: Developed a React-based frontend with Tailwind CSS for a sleek user experience

p3.heading: Bolalar O'yini
p3.info: Modern simple games for kids and to improve their logical skills

text.1: This platform specially created to pass semester exam at University
text.2: Added navbar panel which includes information about documantation and auther
text.3: Live search panel added and made it easy to search for specific game
text.4: Developed a fully interactive Single Page Application using JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5
text.5: Implemented CSS mensary gridlines and inserted many games
text.6: Added Google Dinasour, X or O, Tennis, Drum-kit, Dice Stones

p4.heading: Buxoro Fabrikasi
p4.info: Bukhara Fabric - natural products and collection of thousands of materials for sale

text.1: Used React JS, Javascript, TailwindCSS, CSS3, HTML5 to make this website
text.2: Added AntDesign and Swiper libraries to give smooth animations
text.3: Given ability to work with 3 languages and to be easy for all users
text.4: Created suggestion to offer most relevant or popular products to clients
text.5: Used TailwindCSS to increase this site's SEO and maintain smooth operation

p5.heading: HooBank
p5.info: HooBank is a bank platform which give all online banking facilities to the users

text.1: Specially created to improve web-design knowledge on my own
text.2: Developed a responsive theme using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
text.3: Integrated Bootstrap for modern styling and UI enhancements
text.4: Optimized SEO and page speed using Bootstrap for fast builds
text.5: Implemented custom widgets and plugin compatibility for extended functionality

p6.heading: Udevs Dasturchi Kompaniya
p6.info: A web application for personal use of IT-company, it will offer all services of that company

text.1: Personal website for Udevs IT company
text.2: Created with Vite JS to make it fast and effecient
text.3: Added interactive and user-friendly interface to attracte satisfy clients
text.4: Used Tailwindcss to give flawless and smooth motion to site and increase its SEO

experiences.heading: Mening ish tajribam
experiences.text: Men oxirgi 2 yil davomida Front-end Development ustida ishlayapman. Mana mening sayohatimning xronologiyasi

exp1.1: - Texnik tajribani namoyish qilish uchun Three.js, React, Vite va WebAPI yordamida shaxsiy portfel yaratildi
exp1.2: - Texnik ko'nikmalarni doimiy ravishda oshirish va zamonaviy veb-ishlab chiqish va back-end texnologiyalari bo'yicha tajribani kengaytirish

exp2.1: - Jamoani samarali boshqarish, Trelloda vazifalar o'z vaqtida bajarilishi kerakligiga ishonch hosil qilish
exp2.2: - Mijozlar bilan real vaqt rejimida aloqani ta'minlash uchun veb-saytlarga Telegram botlari va EmailJS qo'shish
exp2.3: - UX dizaynini yaxshilash uchun saytlarni moslashuvchan va silliq qilish uchun Three.js, antDesign, Swiper, Aos kutubxonalaridan foydalanish
exp2.4: - Ko'p tilli saytlarni yaratish uchun i18next kutubxonalaridan samarali foydalanish
exp2.5: - Tailwind, .env va React JS bilan sezgir, xavfsiz va Rest-full API asosidagi veb-saytlarni yaratish
exp2.6: - Passiv mudofaa tashkiloti va Milliy kiberkosmos markazi tomonidan o'rnatilgan standartlarga rioya qilgan holda, ilova xavfsizligi yaxshilandi va yangi xususiyatlar ishlab chiqildi
exp2.7: - MapsUI-dan foydalangan holda intuitiv xarita interfeyslari ishlab chiqilgan va amalga oshirilgan, foydalanuvchi tajribasini yaxshilaydi va xaritaning uzluksiz interaktiv integratsiyasini ta'minlaydi
exp2.8: - Windows Forms va WPF ramkalaridan foydalangan holda ilovalarning sezgirligi va qulayligi yaxshilandi
exp2.9: - X-DOM yordamida XML-dan SVG-ga konvertatsiya qilindi, bu dinamik va samarali ma'lumotlar vizualizatsiyasini ta'minlaydi

exp3.1: - Murakkab saytlar, kichik o'lchamli veb-saytlar yaratish va uni faqat tez qilish
exp3.2: - Kod takrorlanishini yo'qotish uchun kuchli algoritm yaratish va saytlarni tez va engil qilish
exp3.3: - Samaradorlik va SEOni 90% - 100% gacha oshirish va Google qidiruvida saytlarni yuqoriga ko'tarish
exp3.4: - keng ko'lamli ma'lumotlarni qabul qilish va tahlil qilish uchun ishlab chiqilgan tizimlar, ma'lumotlarni samarali qayta ishlash va saqlashni ta'minlaydi
exp3.5: ✅ ISO 26262 avtomobil xavfsizligi standartlariga rioya qilgan holda xavfsiz API joriy etildi
exp3.6: ✅ Sanoatga mos protokollar orqali mijozlar va hamkorlar uchun ma'lumotlar maxfiyligi ta'minlandi
exp3.7: ✅ Havodan yangilanishlar, real vaqtda kuzatish va masofadan ishga tushirish imkoniyatlari kabi masofaviy xususiyatlar taqdim etildi

testimonials.heading: Mening mijozlarimning sharhlari
testimonials.oybek: Men hech qachon bunday narsani ko'rmaganman. Bu ajoyib. Men uni yaxshi ko'raman.
testimonials.sardorbek: Nima deyishni bilmayman. Gapirdim. Bu ajoyib.
testimonials.navro'za: Men so'zni bilmay qoldim. Bu ajoyib. Men buni yaxshi ko'raman.
testimonials.javohir: Bu men boshdan kechirgan eng yaxshi narsa. Tavsiya qilaman!
testimonials.rustambek: Bu barcha kutganlarimdan oshib ketdi. Mutlaqo ajoyib!
testimonials.muhammadkarim: Shunchaki hayratlanarli. Bir muncha vaqt ichida qilgan eng yaxshi qarorim.
testimonials.shohruz: Buni topganimdan xursandman. Bu men uchun o'yinni o'zgartirdi.

contact.heading: Menga Yozing
contact.text: Yangi veb-sayt yaratmoqchimisiz, mavjud platformangizni yaxshilamoqchimisiz yoki noyob loyihani hayotga tatbiq qilmoqchimisiz, men yordam berish uchun shu yerdaman
